plugin.name: PluginFunctions
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.purpose: plugin functions such as reload, list, etc

muclient.script:
internalrevision = "$Rev$"
dofile (GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID (), 20) .. "luapath.lua")
require "var" require "serialize" require "commas" require "pluginhelper" require "verify" require "tprint" require "pairsbykeys" require "ldplugin"
phelpplugins = {} cached_plugins = {}
function format_plugin(plugin) hname = string.format("%-30s", tostring(plugin.name)) if plugin.phelp == true then hver = string.format("%4s ", tostring(getversion())) else hver = string.format("%.2f ", plugin.version) end hcmd = string.format("%-10s", tostring(plugin.cmd)) hdeb = string.format("%-8s", tostring(plugin.tdebug)) hena = string.format("%-10s", tostring(plugin.enabled)) hmem = string.format("%-10s", tostring(plugin.memusage)) ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", hname .. hver .. hcmd .. hdeb .. hena .. hmem) end
function format_header() hname = string.format("%-30s", "Name") hver = string.format("%-6s", "Vers" ) hcmd = string.format("%-10s", "Cmd/Short") hdeb = string.format("%-8s", "Debug") hena = string.format("%-10s", "Enabled") hmem = string.format("%-10s", "Mem Usage (KB)") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", hname .. hver .. hcmd .. hdeb .. hena .. hmem) end
function plugins_list_helper(header, type, search) local pluginsall = {} local memusage = 0 if search == nil then search = '.*' end numfound, plist = getmatches(search) phelper:plugin_header(header .. ' - Found: ' .. tostring(numfound)) format_header() ColourNote("white", "black", "-----------------------------------------------------------------------") for _, pdict in pairs(plist) do pluginsall[GetPluginInfo(pdict.id, 1)] = { id = pdict.id, name = pdict.name, cmd = pdict.cmd or "", tdebug = GetPluginVariable(pdict.id, 'tdebug') or "", enabled = GetPluginInfo(pdict.id, 17), version = GetPluginInfo(pdict.id, 19), memusage = "" } if GetPluginInfo(pdict.id, 17) and PluginSupports(pdict.id, "getmemoryusage") == error_code.eOK then local throwaway, tmem = CallPlugin(pdict.id, "getmemoryusage") pluginsall[GetPluginInfo(pdict.id, 1)].memusage = string.format("%0d", tonumber(tmem)) memusage = memusage + tonumber(pluginsall[GetPluginInfo(pdict.id, 1)].memusage) else pluginsall[GetPluginInfo(pdict.id, 1)].memusage = "" end if PluginSupports(pdict.id, "isphelp") == error_code.eOK then pluginsall[GetPluginInfo(pdict.id, 1)].phelp = true end end for _,v in pairsByKeys(pluginsall) do if type then if v[type] then format_plugin(v) end else format_plugin(v) end end ColourNote("white", "black", "-----------------------------------------------------------------------") local hname = string.format("%-30s", "Totals") local hver = string.format("%-6s", "" ) local hcmd = string.format("%-10s", "") local hdeb = string.format("%-8s", "") local hena = string.format("%-10s", "") local hmem = string.format("%-10s", tostring(memusage)) ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", hname .. hver .. hcmd .. hdeb .. hena .. hmem) ColourNote("", "", "") end
function cmd_list(cmddict) plugins_list_helper("Plugins List", nil, cmddict[1]) end
function cmd_phelp(cmddict) plugins_list_helper("PHelper Plugins List", 'phelp', cmddict[1]) end
function match_plugin_name(plugin, name) found = string.find(plugin, name) if found == nil then return false end return true end
function getmatches(name) local matches = {} local numfound = 0 local loadedplugins = GetPluginList() or {} for _, p in ipairs (loadedplugins) do local temp = { name = GetPluginInfo (p, 1), cmd = GetPluginVariable(p, 'cmd') or "", id = p, file = GetPluginInfo (p, 6)} if match_plugin_name(temp.name, name) or match_plugin_name(temp.cmd, name) or temp.id == name then matches[p] = temp numfound = numfound + 1 end end return numfound, matches end
functionlist = { Reload = {all = reloadallplugins, one = reloadplugin, tstr = "reloaded"}, Enable = {all = enableallplugins, one = enableplugin, tstr = "enabled"}, Disable = {all = disableallplugins, one = disableplugin, tstr = "disabled"}, Unload = {one = unloadplugin, tstr = "unloaded"}, }
function dofunc(type, id) local tfunc = functionlist[type]['one'] tfunc(id) end
function cmd_helper(type, tomatch, other) if tomatch == "all" then local tfunc = functionlist[type]['all'] if tfunc then tfunc() end return end local numfound = 0 local matches = {} numfound, matches = getmatches(tomatch) if numfound > 1 and other ~= 'all' then phelper:plugin_header(type) ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", "multiple plugins match: " .. tomatch) for id, t in pairs(matches) do ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", " " .. t.name) end ColourNote("", "", "") return elseif numfound < 1 then phelper:plugin_header(type) ColourNote(RGBColourToName(var.plugin_colour), "black", "no plugins match " .. tomatch) ColourNote("", "", "") return end for id, t in pairs(matches) do DoAfterSpecial(2, 'dofunc("' .. type .. '", "' .. id .. '")', 12) if other ~= 'all' then return end end ColourNote("", "", "") end
function cmd_reload(cmddict) if #cmddict < 1 or cmddict[1] == 'help' then phelper:plugin_header('reload') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " reload <plugin>") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "reload a plugin") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) the plugin to reload, can be by name or cmd if a Bast plugin") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(optional) the 'all' keyword, which will reload all plugins that match the <plugin> argument") return end tomatch = cmddict[1] arg2 = cmddict[2] cmd_helper("Reload", tomatch, arg2) end
function cmd_enable(cmddict) if #cmddict < 1 or cmddict[1] == 'help' then phelper:plugin_header('enable') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " enable <plugin>") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "enable a plugin") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) the plugin to enable, can be by name or cmd if a Bast plugin") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(optional) the 'all' keyword, which will enable all plugins that match the <plugin> argument") return end tomatch = cmddict[1] arg2 = cmddict[2] cmd_helper("Enable", tomatch, arg2) end
function cmd_disable(cmddict) if #cmddict < 1 or cmddict[1] == 'help' then phelper:plugin_header('disable') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " disable <plugin>") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "disable a plugin") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) the plugin to disable, can be by name or cmd if a Bast plugin") return end tomatch = cmddict[1] arg2 = cmddict[2] cmd_helper("Disable", tomatch, arg2) end
function cmd_unload(cmddict) if #cmddict < 1 or cmddict[1] == 'help' then phelper:plugin_header('unload') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " unload <plugin>") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "unload a plugin") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) the plugin to unload, can be by name or cmd if a Bast plugin") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(optional) the 'all' keyword, which will unload all plugins that match the <plugin> argument") return end tomatch = cmddict[1] arg2 = cmddict[2] cmd_helper("Unload", tomatch, arg2) end
function cmd_load(cmddict) if #cmddict < 1 or cmddict[1] == 'help' then phelper:plugin_header('load') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " load <plugin>") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "load a plugin") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) the filename of the plugin to load, must be exact case") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(optional) the 'all' keyword, which will load all plugins that match the <plugin> argument") return end for _, v in ipairs(cmddict) do ldplugin(v, nil, true) end end
function cmd_loaddir(cmddict) if #cmddict < 1 or cmddict[1] == 'help' then phelper:plugin_header('loaddir') ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "Usage: " .. phelper.cmd .. " loaddir <statement> ") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "load a directory of plugin") ColourNote(RGBColourToName(phelper.plugin_colour), "black", "(required) the directory to load plugins from") return end
local dir = GetInfo (60)
if cmddict[1] then dir = dir .. cmddict[1] .. "\\" end
-- find all xml files in directory local t = utils.readdir (dir .. "*.xml")
-- build list of file names local plugins = {}
-- copy from keys of the table of names, into a new table, dropping files starting with "." for k in pairs (t) do if k:sub (1, 1) ~= "." then table.insert (plugins, k) end -- not temporary files end -- for adding each one
-- find installed plugins local installed_plugins = GetPluginList() or {}
-- for each file, see if it is already installed for i, p in ipairs (plugins) do local installed = false
-- check installed list for _, v in pairs (installed_plugins) do if GetPluginInfo (v, 6) == (dir .. p) then installed = true end -- if already installed end
-- not there? load it if not installed then ColourNote ("white", "green", "Installing plugin " .. p) check (LoadPlugin (dir .. p)) -- load it end -- if
end -- each plugin file
end

phelper:set_default('cmd', 'plugins') phelper:set_default('plugin_colour', 'red')
phelper:add_setting("helpoutputtext", {help="true: all help text goes to output, false: opens miniwindow", type="bool", default=verify_bool("false"), sortlev=1, longname="All help goes to output window"})
phelper:add_cmd('list', {func=cmd_list, help="list all plugins", default=true, sortgroup="Obtaining information on plugins", prio=40}) phelper:add_cmd('phelp', {func=cmd_phelp, help="list plugins that are installed with pluginhelper", sortgroup="Obtaining information on plugins", prio=40})
phelper:add_cmd('reload', {func=cmd_reload, help='reload a plugin, "all" will reload all plugins, "<plugin> all" will reload all plugins that match <plugin>', sortgroup="Manipulating plugins", prio=50}) phelper:add_cmd('load', {func=cmd_load, help="load a plugin by name, must match the exact case of the file without the .xml", sortgroup="Manipulating plugins", prio=51}) phelper:add_cmd('unload', {func=cmd_unload, help='unload a plugin', sortgroup="Manipulating plugins", prio=52}) phelper:add_cmd('enable', {func=cmd_enable, help='enable a plugin, "all" will enable all plugins, "<plugin> all" will enable all plugins that match <plugin>', sortgroup="Manipulating plugins", prio=53}) phelper:add_cmd('disable', {func=cmd_disable, help='disable a plugin, "all" will disable all plugins, "<plugin> all" will disable all plugins that match <plugin>', sortgroup="Manipulating plugins", prio=54}) phelper:add_cmd('loaddir', {func=cmd_loaddir, help="load all plugins in a specific dir", sortgroup="Manipulating plugins", prio=55})
phelper:enable()
